frontmatter.name: swFlangePositionTypes_e
frontmatter.description: Position types for sheet metal edge flanges.

title: swFlangePositionTypes_e
description: Position types for sheet metal edge flanges.

values.description: = The flange position will always be tangent to the side face attached to the selected edge, and the flange length will always maintain the exact length; not valid for the Up To Edge And Merge length end condition
